messages.subject: Llano???
messages.msgSnippet: WELLLLLLLLl Howdy neighbor  :) here ya go (Pris handing Melodie a nice COOOOOOLD glass of lemonade) ~ would you like a yummy  maraschino cherry in
messages.messageBody:
WELLLLLLLLl Howdy neighbor <SMILES> :)

here ya go (Pris handing Melodie a nice COOOOOOLD glass of lemonade) ~>
would you like a yummy maraschino cherry in your lemonade, too??? lol ...
yes, we're in the burbs of SA where we've OFFICIALLY reached an ALL TIME
HIGH of 109* in SA ... the 5pm news said this was the HIGHEST OF ALL HIGHS
EVER RECORDED since they've kept records in the late 1890's!!! wellllllll,
my weatherbug said it was 111*, who cares, this heat is just RUTHLESS ...
all my ferns are DYING b/c we're rationing water and the poor grass crunches
when you walk on it ...

ohhhhhh yes, I know exactly where you are (Llano/Fred)!!! ohhhhhh, the TX
hill country is one of our *fav* places to go camping in the fall/spring <G>
... we're HOPING to get the *camping itch* in a few wks when the weather
cools off a bit but NOT RIGHT NOW :P

Pris ~> waving to her hill country neighbors :)
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...



----- Original Message -----
From: "Ashling Ranch" <Ashling@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 04, 2000 6:46 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Apologies from Dawn F


> Pris,
>
> Pass the Lemonade! My weatherbug says its down to 105. But considering
that
> it is after 6:30, I'm underwhelmed with the decrease from a high of 108
> earlier in the day!!!
>
> Did you say you are in the burbs near San Antonio? I am in the sticks
> approximately 100 miles from both SA and Austin. Actually we are 21 miles
> to Llano and 21 miles to Fredericksburg. As soon as we can find good jobs
> and get our place (21 acres, house, antique log cabin, and several
> outbuildings) on the market, we are heading for the Pacific Northwest.
> Their highs in the daytime are lower than our lows at night.
>
> Melodie :)
>
>
